Posts.Content: Jun 14, 2017 09:14AM Mendyro wrote: I had a lumpectomy on May 24th and my breast is quite sore to the touch. Mine feels like it is engorged (like I'm breastfeeding and need to pump) and the nipple is sensitive. I'm assuming this will all go away with time. I haven't been taking anything for pain but suggest you stay on top of it if the pain is affecting your quality of life. Sorry I'm not more help.
Posts.Title: Post Lumpectomy - veru sensitive breast Valencia1 Beachygirl31
